metadata.dc:title: Jay Gould: His Business Career 1867-1892
metadata.dc:creator: Grodinsky, Julius, 1896-
metadata.dc:description: An examination of the policies of a businessman in the field of speculative or equity capital in the free enterprise era between the Civil War and the Theodore Roosevelt Administration. Digital edition converted from Internet Archive scan.
metadata.dc:subject: Biography
Business History
Railroad History
American History
